mapper.insert: insert into product (pname, price, made_by, writer, category, description, image_file) values (#{pname}, #{price}, #{madeBy}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{description}, #{imageFile})
mapper.select: select pno, pname, price, writer, mod_at, read_count, image_file from product order by pno desc
mapper.update: update product set pname = #{pname}, price = #{price}, made_by = #{madeBy}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, image_file = #{imageFile}, read_count = read_count - 2
